medical_history.chief_complaint: Bone pain and deformities associated with Juvenile Paget's Disease (JPD).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented at 4 months of age with painful inflammation of the left femur. Symptoms progressed with marked elevation of bone turnover markers and resulted in severe deformities, frequent fractures, and loss of hearing. Treatment with pamidronate was initiated at 3.5 years of age after initial anti-inflammatory treatment failed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Juvenile Paget's disease; genetic mutation in TNFRSF11B gene causing osteoprotegerin deficiency.
